meanings.sent1: My friend is a fraters in the fraternity.
meanings.sent2: The fraters organized a charity event for the community.
meanings.sent3: The fraters in the fraternity always wear matching jackets.
meanings.sent4: The bond between fraters is as strong as family.
meanings.sent5: Being a fraters means being part of a close-knit group.

meanings.definition: Plural form of frater, meaning brother.
meanings.sent1: The siblings were all fraters, always looking out for each other.
meanings.sent2: He introduced his fraters to his best friend.
meanings.sent3: The fraters in the family had a secret handshake.
meanings.sent4: In times of need, your fraters will stand by you like a shield.
meanings.sent5: Having many fraters can make you feel supported and loved.

meanings.definition: A group of people united in a common purpose or interest.
meanings.sent1: The fraters worked together to clean up the park.
meanings.sent2: The fraters shared a passion for music and formed a band.
meanings.sent3: The fraters in the book club always had lively discussions.
meanings.sent4: Their fratership was like a well-oiled machine, achieving great things.
meanings.sent5: Joining the fraters in the cause brought a sense of belonging and fulfillment.
